attachments.fallback: [sparcs-kaist/sparcssso] New comment by a1sams1a on issue <https://github.com/sparcs-kaist/sparcssso/issues/76#issuecomment-229966536|#76: SSO v2 개발>
attachments.text: draft 1을 slack에 업로드하였습니다. 더 이상 secret key를 서버에 보내지 않으며, 주요 request에 hmac signing을 추가하였습니다.
attachments.pretext: [sparcs-kaist/sparcssso] New comment by a1sams1a on issue <https://github.com/sparcs-kaist/sparcssso/issues/76#issuecomment-229966536|#76: SSO v2 개발>

attachments.fallback: [sparcs-kaist/sparcssso] Issue created: '#84 point API replay attack' https://github.com/sparcs-kaist/sparcssso/issues/84 by a1sams1a
attachments.text: Point API가 시간을 검증하지 않아 replay attack에 취약함. V2가 나오기 전까지 사용 금지
attachments.title: #84 point API replay attack

attachments.fallback: [sparcs-kaist/sparcssso] New comment by a1sams1a on issue <https://github.com/sparcs-kaist/sparcssso/issues/84#issuecomment-229967045|#84: point API replay attack> (assigned to <https://github.com/a1sams1a|a1sams1a>)
attachments.text: v2에서는 request에 timestamp를 넣으며, 3초 이상 차이가 날 경우 실행 안함 / 마지막 포인트 변경 뒤 5초가 지나야 다시 포인트 변경 가능
attachments.pretext: [sparcs-kaist/sparcssso] New comment by a1sams1a on issue <https://github.com/sparcs-kaist/sparcssso/issues/84#issuecomment-229967045|#84: point API replay attack> (assigned to <https://github.com/a1sams1a|a1sams1a>)

text: NOTICE to ALL sysop (<!channel>): SPARCS SSO version 1의 point API가 시간 검증을 하지 않아 replay attack에 취약하므로, version 2가 개발되기까지 사용을 중지해주시기 바랍니다.
